channel.title: Help with a 508 server
channel.description:
I need help making a 508 server i just need a step by step guide im willing to do watever it takes to get my server up and running. I will do anything to have someone help i really need help i have never ran a server but this is what i have downloaded.
Source (about 3) No-ip Java ( v6.18) Moparscape
I need help putting all this stuff in one to make the server i checked so many videos on youtube and alot of tutorial topics on here but they dont go as far as i want them to go.

I did everything you guys told me i went further then i have thanks alot but this came up during the time i put the ip the client connect box.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

If its got an ip changer make it 127.0.0.1
if not then go to i think client.java and search 127.0.0.1 and if its there it should work if nothing is there make it that. And if its there and still not working you’ll need to port forward

Read full topic
